metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1906 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow issue was discovered in ImageMagick's ImportMultiSpectralQuantum() function in MagickCore/quantum-import.c. An attacker could pass specially crafted file to convert, triggering an out-of-bounds read error, allowing an application to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> out of bounds read causing crash only, setting priority to low

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
